pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the therapeutic effect of high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) combined with chemotherapy (paclitaxel + estramustine) on AT2 Dunning adenocarcinoma, as no satisfactory treatment for localized prostate cancer is available for patients with a poor prognosis, e.g. stage T3, a high Gleason score, or a prostate-specific antigen level of >15 ng/mL.

metaData.source:
Salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound versus salvage radical prostatectomy for radiation-recurrent prostate cancer: a comparative study of oncological, functional, and toxicity outcomes
